Radar::Insights::Rules::PayrollCorrectionsProductUpdate.feature_flag returns the correct flag
Radar::Insights::Rules::PayrollCorrectionsProductUpdate.launch_date launch date is correct
Radar::Insights::Rules::PayrollCorrectionsProductUpdate#product_update_applies? with a company that supports payroll with a company that has payslips is expected to equal true

Radar::Insights::Rules::PayrollCorrectionsProductUpdate#product_update_applies? with a company that supports payroll with a company that has payslips when the company is whitelabelled is expected to equal false
Radar::Insights::Rules::PayrollCorrectionsProductUpdate#product_update_applies? with a company that supports payroll with a company that doesn't have payslips is expected to equal false
Radar::Insights::Rules::PayrollCorrectionsProductUpdate#product_update_applies? with a company that doesn't support payroll is expected to equal false
Radar::Insights::Rules::PayrollCorrectionsProductUpdate#should_notify? is the account owner is expected to equal true
Radar::Insights::Rules::PayrollCorrectionsProductUpdate#should_notify? is a director is expected to equal true
Radar::Insights::Rules::PayrollCorrectionsProductUpdate#should_notify? is an account manager is expected to equal true
Radar::Insights::Rules::PayrollCorrectionsProductUpdate#should_notify? is a standard user is expected to equal false
Radar::Insights::Rules::PayrollCorrectionsProductUpdate#mobile? is expected to equal true
